- 2 Location Reference Cards
- 2 A1 Seattle Maps, one double sided

226822.name: Microsized Templates
226822.description:
From publisher blurb:

This installment of 'Everyman Minis includes: 1,000 words increasing Microsized Templates, which simplify the Microsized Creature rules (as well as their corresponding Ordinary-Sized Creature rules) into snippets perfect for quick reference at the gaming table!

226823.name: Hybrid Class: The Mountebank
226823.description:
From publisher blurb:

The mountebank is a consummate con artist who has a way with both words and blades. Quick-witted and fast-talking, he prides himself on winning fights before they begin, using his wits, uncanny gaze… and psychic abilities. His powers of deception and trickery apply equally well in combat. Opponents lose track of him, or follow his hypnotic suggestions, or even attack their own allies in their confusion. The mountebank makes sure that any direct fight he’s involved in isn’t a fair one, though if possible he’d rather manipulate others to get what he wants, then vanish without a trace. Though a mountebank’s skills lend themselves well to all sorts of thievery and wrongdoing, there are also mountebanks who use their talents for more altruistic causes, their dashing adventures making them folk heroes in the areas they frequent.

226824.name: Fane of the Oralites
226824.description:
From publisher blurb:

After your last adventure you had the opportunity to explore the surrounding countryside including the Ravines of Bedic where you discovered the entrance to an old section of forgotten lands of the Abalore. A quick sketch and you return back to town to do a little research. The hidden trail in the ravines appears to have led you to your next adventure with untold riches!

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign for a 4-6 adventurers of 3rd – 4th level and a DM.

226826.name: Bro Up: The Open Card Game
226826.description:
Description from the publisher:

The hand drawn card game packed with total silliness and crazy fun, laughter, combos, trickery, tweaking and teamwork! Make, add or break the Cards or rules, this one belongs to you!

All players start with 13 HP and 3 Game cards. If at any point a player is found with zero life OR game cards they lose. The last man standing wins!

With 260+ unique hand-drawn cards players laugh and fret over luck and unexpected combos yet find quirky strategies at every corner. You damage opponents to knock them out using They regret no losses and find wins to be addictive!

Takes a couple of minutes to learn & plays extra hilariously with teams. Completely family friendly while encourages tweaking the deck for different experiences. Make, add or break the Cards or rules, this one belongs to you!

226827.name: Awaken Quickstart Guide
226827.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the world haunted by the underground terrors and raging Colossi, people are in awe of the chosen ones who walk among them. Those people, called Vasalli are blessed with the powerful Gifts, wielding powers mere mortals can only dream about. But with all their mystical powers, they are still human at heart and humans are fickle and volatile. While some choose to uphold the balance, others seek to disrupt it, using the powers for their own goals.The end result is chaos throughout the world and society.

Come to Liboria, city of thousand islands and one colossal shadow towering over them. Discover what lies underground, stop the threat and decide on the future of the city!

Includes

Full adventure set in one of the Great Cities of the Continent.
Abbreviated rules for the game
Four pre-generated player characters

226828.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Sultanate of Naqala continues to flourish, and the new Sultan has founded five fabulous cities to take advantage of this time of prosperity — but these cities have attracted more competitors than grains of sand in the desert and the fate of the Sultanate will once again lie in the hand of the five tribes and the powerful Djinns.

Five Tribes: Whims of the Sultan contains all the components needed to play five-player games of Five Tribes and introduces new fabulous cities tiles. Visiting these cities gives players opportunities to win glory as they fulfill excessive requests from the Sultan by completing "Whim of the Sultan" cards. Fierce competition is to be expected, as controlling these tiles can be a major contributor to a player's final score.
226828.name: Five Tribes: Whims of the Sultan
boardgamepodcastepisode: #45: Six-Player Six Pack; Las Vegas on tap; Barcelona; Mystic Vale; Betrayal at the Brewery on the Hill

226829.name: Awaken: Dark Fantasy Roleplaying Game
226829.description:
From publisher blurb:

Become a Vasall in Awaken, join the world of battles against the darkness, political struggles and discover the price of retaining humanity in the ruthless world!

Awaken is a tabletop roleplaying game set in a dark, war-ravaged fantasy world heavily influenced by Slavic and Mediterranean folklore, where the forgotten mythologies have resurfaced as Vasalli, powerful humans gifted with abilities capable of changing the course of history.

Inside the Awaken rulebook you’ll find:

A dark, war-ravaged fantasy universe influenced by Slavic and Mediterranean folklore.
A complete game system with intuitive and light rules, which help you tell a story rather than burden you down.
Streamlined rules for Character creation and guidelines for




Narrators, including examples of antagonists.

A Story suitable for venturing into the world of Awaken.

226830.name: Operation: Flash Strike
226830.description:
From publisher blurb:

Operation Flash Strike includes everything new players and a Mission Controller (GM) need to run the Flash Strike Mission. This adventure is designed to introduce new players to the Solar Echoes setting and gameplay mechanics with a learn-as-you-play approach.

In this short mission, players must stop an illegal arms deal, prevent the high-tech weapons from ending up in the hands of criminals, and interrogate key individuals for valuable intel.

47 pages containing the basics needed for play, including:

“Operation: Flash Strike” Mission for beginning level players
8 pre-made characters, with stats, skills, talents, and equipment
Blank character sheet and character sheet pdf entry form
Character sheet explanation
Phase Cards
Full-color character map icons
Map key and full-color, 3-page battle map

226831.name: Tumbleseed
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Audio Honorable Mention
2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
226831.description:
TumbleSeed is a deceptively deep roguelike about balancing a seed up a dangerous and ever-changing mountain.
Avoid holes and defeat corrupted creatures in this dual-stick action adventure. Along your perilous trek you'll be forced to strategize, grow powerful with upgrades, and master the art of rolling to avoid the mountain's many dangers.

TumbleSeed features 5 procedurally generated worlds and over 30 unique seed powers. Top your personal best or compete with the world in the daily challenge. The mountain holds many surprises, secrets, and adventures waiting to be explored — see you on the slopes!

Source: The Game Website.

226832.name: NBA Playgrounds
226832.description:
Classic NBA arcade action is back with NBA Playgrounds!
Take your “A” game to the playground and beat the best in high-flying 2-on-2 basketball action. Practice your skills offline, play with up to three others, or take your talents online to posterize your opponents with acrobatic jams and ridiculous displays of skill.
All 30 NBA teams are featured in NBA Playgrounds, as well an extensive roster of current and retired NBA players that you can level up over time. There are hundreds of over-the-top dunks and moves to unleash for show-stopping displays of acrobatic skill on lively playgrounds across the globe.

Source: The Developer Website.

226833.name: NARCOS: Build your Empire
226833.description:
Description from the publisher:

Build and manage your drug trafficking network. Your goal is to reach the greatest fortune before finishing the game.

You start with a small drug trafficking network with cards representing Plantation, Laboratory, Transport and Route of sale, and through a series of actions on press your luck mechanic, you must be able to produce, transport and sell your merchandise to the highest bidder.

226834.name: Sanctum Secorum (Issue 24 - May 2017)
rpg: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226834.description:
Sanctum Secorum
Issue 24
May 2017

Three Hearts and Three Lions

226835.name: Glory
226835.description:
Description from the publisher:

Are you ready to laugh while being challenged? Reap the glorious Glory while playing this funny and strategic resource management game!
Glory is a competitive resource management game for 2-4 players. Players take up the mantle of various champions, who are represented by iconic role-playing classes with a slight twist. During the course of the game, players will collect and use resources like might and sorcery. They can use their resources to combat creatures for Glory, spend them with Glory to devote creatures to increase their army and gain more resources every turn, or use them to purchase powerful spells that will sway the balance of the game.

226836.name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault – Ahsoka Tano Ally Pack
226836.description:
Description from the publisher:

The legendary Ahsoka Tano lends her Force talents and rebellious spirit to your cause with the Ahsoka Tano Ally Pack for Imperial Assault!

With her twin lightsabers, Ahsoka may offer you just the edge you need to survive your adventures in Coruscant. Her Force leaps allow her to move quickly into position wherever she’s needed most, and then she can press the attack with one blue die and two green dice, as well as the ability to reroll all her attack dice or all the defender's defense dice.

You’ll find more of Ahsoka's talents, spirit, and connection to the Force represented among the expansion’s mission and Command cards. Four of these Command cards strengthen her connection to the Force, and the fifth takes full advantage of her talents as a Spy. Finally, two new skirmish missions provide ample opportunities for you to fight alongside Ahsoka, sowing chaos in the heart of the Empire.

226837.name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault – Emperor Palpatine Villain Pack
226837.description:
Description from the publisher:

Throw Force lightning, tempt others down the road to ruin, and spur others toward spontaneous violence with the Emperor Palpatine Villain Pack for Imperial Assault!

Although this Sith Lord and head of the Galactic Empire does most of his work behind the scenes, playing admirals and generals and politicians like puppets, you'll find Palpatine more than capable of taking to the streets and acting directly to advance his interests. No matter whether you have the Emperor navigate Coruscant and its intrigues in your campaign or lead his army into quickly fought skirmishes, his impressive melee skills and inherent Pierce "3" offer only the merest hints of his full range of power.

And, as befits his status as master of the dark side of the Force and supreme ruler of the galaxy, the Emperor also comes with a full suite of Force-themed Command cards and an Agenda deck that allows you to explore his many plots.

226838.name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault – Maul Villain Pack
226838.description:
Description from the publisher:

With the Maul Villain Pack, you can bring one of the galaxy’s deadliest Force users to your games of Imperial Assault, either as a powerful piece in the Imperial player's greater campaign designs or as an independent member of the Mercenary faction, ready to join any skirmish army that might allow him to further his own interests.

In either case, you'll find Maul eager to claim vengeance. To that end, he may be willing to stick to the Coruscant shadows and skyrises for a short time, stalking his prey, but it won't be long before his rage and fury get the better of him. Then, when Maul leaps into the fray with his iconic dual-bladed lightsaber, you'll find him more than capable of cutting cleanly through the defenses of any who stand against him. And while much about this former Sith is shrouded in mystery, you'll quickly learn that he's sustained by rage and almost always looking for a fight.

226839.description:
Description from the publisher:

"Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side."
–Emperor Palpatine

The Heart of the Empire expansion for Imperial Assault welcomes you to Coruscant, capital of the galaxy! This globe-spanning metropolis is the home of Emperor Palpatine and countless other beings. It is also the home of countless mysteries, including the location of an ancient artifact of incredible importance…

Set forth on a new, highly replayable campaign of sixteen missions that explore every level of the world, from its glistening halls of power to its grimy underworld alleys. You'll find three new heroes ready to join the Rebellion, aided by the talented Force user Ahsoka Tano. You'll maneuver through the crowded city, pursued and confronted by Imperials at every turn. And you'll find the Emperor isn't the only major player working against you. The former Sith, Maul, has sent a Clawdite Shapeshifter to pursue the artifact, and any face in the crowd might hide the Shapeshifter's true identity.

Altogether, Heart of the Empire expands your campaign and skirmish games with three heroes and thirteen other figures, including the massive AT-DP, baton-wielding Riot Troopers, and twin-gunned Sentry Droids. Coruscant comes to life with dozens of new map tiles and more than 130 cards. New energy shield and rubble tokens will throw a wrench in your opponent’s plans by modifying the battlefield, and new power tokens give you more control over your fate than ever before!
226839.name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault – Heart of the Empire

226840.name: Star Wars: Rebellion – Rise of the Empire
226840.description:
Description from the publisher:

"Our Rebellion is all that remains to push back the Empire. We think you may be able to help us."
–Mon Mothma

New leaders. New missions. New tactic cards that lead to more fully cinematic combats… Rise of the Empire is an expansion for Star Wars: Rebellion inspired largely by the movie Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. And just as the movie provided new insight into the Galactic Civil War presented in the original Star Wars trilogy, Rise of the Empire adds new depth and story to your Rebellion game experience.

You can send Jyn Erso and Cassian Andor to recover the Death Star plans. You can confuse Imperials with false orders and assaults behind enemy lines. You can command Director Krennic and his finest death troopers. And you can set traps for the Rebel pilots and soldiers, luring them away from their base and into massive battles with more fully cinematic combat and tactics. Even Jabba the Hutt makes an appearance, offering his services to the Empire and feeding his prisoners to the Sarlaac.

Altogether, Rise of the Empire introduces eight new leaders, thirty-six plastic miniatures, five target markers, two attachment rings, three new dice, and more than one-hundred new cards. You'll find U-wings, TIE Strikers, Nebulon-B frigates, and the Interdictor. You'll gain new ways of subverting your opponent's plans, and you'll discover a whole new chapter in your ongoing Galactic Civil War!

boardgameimplementation: Flames of War: The World War II Miniatures Game
226841.description:
Lt. Colonel Yuri Potecknov's motor rifle battalion is preparing to execute its mission in the scientific manner that he had been taught at the Frunze Military Academy and used in Afghanistan. Victory today will bring the world proletarian revolution that much closer.

Contains nine plastic T-72 Tanks, two plastic Mi-24 Hind Attack Helicopters, two plastic tank commander sprues, two decal sheets, six unit cards and one printed cardboard Artillery & Salvo template.
226841.name: Team Yankee: Potecknov’s Bears – Soviet Breakthrough Force

226842.name: Yavalax
226842.description:
Rules for Yavalax

Goal: Simultaneously create two or more rows of exactly four stones of your color.

Components: Square grid board at least 15x15 in size, with a
sufficient number of white/black stones to fill the board.

Note: n-in-a-row counts both orthogonally and diagonally.

Play: White starts by placing a white stone at an empty cell. Players then take turns placing two stones of their color at empty cells, one stone after another.

In each placement, players are not allowed to create a single
4-in-a-row of their color, unless that placement simultaneously
creates at least one other 4-in-a-row of their color to win the game.

This means that players may NOT make a single 4-in-a-row of their color on the first placement of their turn even if they can make a second 4-in-a-row on their second placement.

In no event are players allowed to create 5 (or more) -in-a-row of their color.

The first player to make simultaneous 4-in-a-rows of their color wins immediately, whether it was their first or second placement.

Yavalax is inspired by both Yavalath and Connect6.

226844.name: The Foreign Princess
226844.description:
From the introduction:

A power struggle in a foreign land has sent a princess into exile. Hot on her heels are a band of assassins intent on ending the royal line. The princess has nowhere to hide and no one to turn to.

226845.name: Quizmania
226845.description:
Quizmania was created for all who like to have fun with friends and use time profitably! We turned the classic format of the game into quizzes not forgetting about technologies. This game gives you a chance to test your knowledge and compete with friends at home, outside or in your favorite cafe!

Purpose of the game

It’s very simple. The first team that answers correctly to the quizzes, solves 360 ​​VR tasks using smartphone and Google Cardboard and reaches the finish line wins!

226846.name: Feudum: The Queen's Army
226846.description:
Description from the publisher:

Oh Bullocks! The Queen’s tyranny is spreading into every corner of the kingdom. Her foot soldiers scour the countryside to hunt the behemoth—the bewitched king that was once her husband! Your small band of rebels will need sharp wits and a bit of luck to save the king and reclaim the land’s virtue, as well as your own.

The Queen’s Army is a solo variant expansion to Feudum. The game pits you against Queen Ann in an epic battle to score the most veneration points over 5 epochs.

First, her Majesty will ruthlessly target the bewitched King (The
Behemoth) in effort to diminish your fame. After the King is dead (or by the dawn of third epoch), she will mount her black horse to pursue your band of rebels with a vengeance.

The Queen plays the game with unlimited resources and no movement restrictions. Any actual resources she acquires along the way count as veneration points!

Can you thwart her quest for the King’s demise, while securing your own prestige? By the Sword of Leinad, you shall prevail!

Development Notes:

The elegantly crafted automa deck was developed in collaboration with J.R. Honeycutt (developer for Tesla vs Edison: Powering Up!) and Brian Neff. The expansion features an elegantly designed A.I. player that cleverly reacts to game conditions as well as keeping you guessing with unpredictable maneuvering.

Rounds are played just like the base game with alternating turns, round by round until each epoch is triggered. However, the Queen is less restrained by resource or route requirements making her a powerful force to reckon with!

226848.name: A Gathering of Souls
226848.description:
From publisher blurb:

A gathering of souls consists of a set of quick-start rules and an introductory scenario for Ambrosia that is meant to be played by a game-master and three to four players using pre-generated characters. Only the quick-start rules included in this book are required to run this scenario.

The noble houses Baligant and Tauernier have been bitter rivals for centuries. When a child of Tauernier is born on the soil of house Baligant, however, a political marriage is arranged to build a bridge between the two families. As this child has now come of age and the marriage date draws near, dark forces awake in the ancient woods of Ketendal from a years long slumber.

For this Tauernier was born during a terrible storm, resulting in the destruction of the Baligants’ castle Valanthil - and history seems to be repeating itself. As a new storm rages through the region, buried secrets that might pose a threat to the fragile peace between the two houses are bound to resurface...

226849.name: The Lunion Shield Worlds
226849.description:
From publisher blurb:

The ‘Lunion Shield Worlds’ is an unofficial term referring to a group of star systems on the border between the Third Imperium and the Sword Worlds Confederation.

Although they form part of the Spinward Main, these worlds are very much a backwater and frontier. Few major corporations are keen to invest in a region that will surely be a battleground in any future war, leaving opportunities for smaller firms and private operators to move in and take up the slack. The Shield Worlds are a high-risk environment, but risk and reward go hand in hand… at least, sometimes.

226850.name: The Elder God Diary 4/11
226850.description:
From the introduction:

Find and retrieve the Mirror of Daylight. Let's hope it's a pocket mirror! (Brought Franz in case it's not, he can help carry it!)

226851.name: Way of the Wild
226851.description:
From the introduction:

A 2-4 hour adventure for 3rd to 5th level characters.

Deep within the Watchwoods a group of hunters search for the terrifying beast that attacked their town, but for those who delve deeper all is not as it first seems.

226852.name: #SUPERHEROES
226852.description:
From the introduction:

No-one can escape social media's pervasive influence, especially the superheroes who so valiantly fight to protect our cities. In many ways, they are the ultimate celebrities of today. And with all that saving of the planet to do, many have decided to hire professional help to keep up with their twitter account and schedule talk show appearances.

You are these professionals.

226853.name: Quizmania
226853.description:
Description from the publisher:

Quizmania was created for all who like to have fun with friends and use time profitably! We turned the classic format of the game into quizzes not forgetting about technologies. This game gives you a chance to test your knowledge and compete with friends at home, outside or in your favorite cafe!

Purpose of the game

It’s very simple. The first team that answers correctly to the quizzes, solves 360 ​​VR tasks using smartphone and Google Cardboard and reaches the finish line wins!

226854.name: 1980 Warsaw
226854.description:
From the introduction:

The year is 1980 and the place is communist Poland. Shop shelves are empty more often than not, strikes are paralyzing the country, and it’s clear that the government is more and more incompetent. The regular shops and offices don’t exist to serve the customer, but the state. Therefore, in the world of perpetual shortages people take up common, everyday minor swindles and cheats.

226855.name: Last Shift
226855.description:
From the introduction:

Everything you've worked for all your life, is about to become worthless

Coalfell has been the home of the fourth largest Christmas ornament factory in the country for nearly a century, but now the influx of foreign imports has cut their market share to the point where the owners, the Parsons, historically true pillars of the community, are unable to keep the doors open.

The factory has been the biggest employer in the town for generations. Other opportunities: nonexistent. Everyone knows the loss of the factory will devastate the local economy, but no one has been able to bring forth other options.

It's the last shift before the bank comes in to close the doors. The mood is grim, as the last deliveries are being prepared. Some hold on to some desperate hope, some are looking forward to drowning their sorrows in booze.

Gladly, no-one is about to do something rash.

226856.name: Schundabenteuer
226856.description:
User summary:

This unusual playset eschews an established setup in favor of allowing the players to create the milieu as they play through the characters' development. Aside from this open-ended setup, the playset is fairly typical in construction.

226857.name: Extreme Burger Defense
226857.description:
You%27re a scientist who has crafted the most delicious burger in the universe, which also happens to attract every bear in the universe%2E Including cyborg bears%2E

Rub your thumbs together like a cricket in heat and prepare to die%21

Source: The Developer Website.

226858.name: Freeway Mutant
226858.description:
In this spin on the endless running genre, you play as a nude green mutant running along a broken-up freeway in post-apocalyptic Somewhere%2E As you run, you can acquire all manner of materials to continually upgrade your gun until you%27re TOTALLY ROCKIN%27 IT%21

Also, the road is littered with active landmines and hideous mutants, and you have a pair of extremely smooth, round cheeks%2E

Source: The Developer Website.

226859.name: Horripilation
226859.description:
From the introduction:

The town of Stineville is a great place to have a fresh start. Interesting neighbors, plenty to do, a good assortment of local businesses. It’s enough to make anyone not want to leave. Except you’ve been noticing things. Things that make you question the reality of the town. Perhaps Stineville is a little more strange than everyone would have you believe.

226860.name: Battle Kittens
226860.description: In the world of Battle Kittens, you are one of the Cat King's royal Cat Herders, assigned to draft the cutest, strongest, wisest, and most agile kittens in the kingdom. Three battlegrounds are presented each round, with each randomly having a particular Battle Kitten trait played onto it. Players begin by drafting adorably ferocious kitten cards, then dividing them into squads and deploying those squads to the battlefields. The squads with the three highest point totals in a battlefield are awarded a number of fish tokens in accordance with that particular battlefield's allotment. After three rounds are completed, the Cat Herder with the biggest haul of fish tokens wins the game!

226861.name: Scared
226861.description:
From the publisher's description:

Scared is a rules light RPG that uses a standard deck of playing card without dice.

The game is fast easy to understand and deadly.

The core mechanics supporting a narratives play style and can be use in nearly every genre and theme.

226862.name: Fetch
226862.description:
The dog wants the bone, the cat wants the yarn, the mouse wants the cheese and the squirrel wants the acorn. Sounds like this game of fetch should be a walk in the park, right? In any other park, yes, but not here! Roll the dice, then shift, rotate and rearrange the maze-like park tiles to help your animal friend retrieve their treats the fastest while slowing your foes down.

The park play space consists of 16 tiles in a grid plus up to 4 home base tiles (1 for each player). Roll the 8-sided die to determine which rows or columns of the grid you can choose to shift or rotate on your turn, then move your animal up to two tiles. Retrieve your animal's treats from the other animals' home base tiles and return to your own first to win!

226863.name: Apocalyptia V2.0
226863.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

This is the second edition of Apocalyptia, an open-source tabletop roleplaying game about The End. The setting is our world in the not-too-distant future. There are 12 distinct apocalyptic Scenarios presented here, each with unique challenges and opportunities. Character development is not really about leveling up stats, but rather the characters themselves change as they grow, getting better at some things while getting rusty in others. They struggle for survival and sanity as friends and loved ones die all around them. Individual prowess is never as important as the support of your Team, your Faction, and your Settlement. Ultimately, the game is about overcoming those things that have divided humanity for so long, and coming together to build a better world out of the rubble of the old.

The only die you need to play Apocalyptia is a d6. The game is designed to be a military-style simulation with the intention of balancing system crunchiness with fast-paced play. The book is written with a lot of system abbreviations to pack as much game content into this small package as possible. For best results, the Game Narrator should be experienced with common roleplaying game concepts and become comfortable with the rules since the majority of the work of running the game is placed on the Narrator. Character creation usually takes 20 minutes or less, which is good since the mortality rate is rather high in the Wasteland.

Game Features:

Easy random Area and Encounter generation procedures
Detailed Equipment lists, mods, and vehicles for those who love to Scavenge for Loot
Over 100 unique non-player characters and creatures in 12 different Apocalyptic Scenarios
Realistic tactical combat and survival based on real-world techniques
Faction Bases and inter-Faction relations, including Faction Warfare
Rules for building Team Bases and entire Settlement

In this second edition of the game, the rules have been cleaned up, balanced, and expanded to allow as many options as players and game narrators can imagine. Additional artwork, game mechanics, and setting content gives greater detail and increased possibilities for your Apocalyptic adventures.

This PDF is formatted to make printing easy. Each page is 8.5" x 5.5" so that two pages can be printed on each side of a standard sheet of printer paper, allowing the easy printing of Apocalyptia manuals with common printer booklet settings.

226864.name: Apocalyptia: Basic Training
226864.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

Apocalyptia: Basic Training is a quickstart rules-lite version of the Apocalyptia core system designed to introduce new players to the key concepts of the game.

Basic Training is meant for simple one-shot games. The fine details of Apocalyptia have been scaled back to a bare minimum in order to get people playing as quickly as possible.

After playing a session or two, gaming groups can make an instant transition with their Basic Training characters into the full rules set or they can incorporate the rules they need and ignore the rest as they wish. This makes Basic Training an ideal way to start a game with players who have no idea what awaits them out in the Wasteland.

226865.name: #AlternativeFacts
226865.description:
Welcome to the post-fact world of lucrative headline crafting! You and your team of genius entrepreneurs must work together to make the most clickbaiting headlines possible. Is this a cooperative game? Hell no! You want to win the headline by contributing the best card to it, so screw those other guys.

Each card has a noun, verb, or adjective on it, plus a Clickbait Strength number and possibly a Hot-button icon. You and the other players will use the cards to construct a single headline.

The game is played in rounds, where each player takes their turn playing a single card to the headline that is forming in the middle of the table. Once the headline has 2 Hot-button icons in it, the round ends. Read the headline out loud. The player who has the WINNING! card in front of them wins the round and takes a card from the headline and adds it to their score pile. The 1st player to collect 7 cards this way wins!

226866.name: Bangarang Bonhomie vs. CrimeCo International!
226866.description:
From the designer's comments:

Welcome to my love letter to the bizarre cult movie, “Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension, in which the hero is a country star/neurosurgeon/samurai/experimental vehicle pilot. I may be forgetting one or two. The mechanics were inspired by Wheel Tree Press’ Time Cellist and Grant Howitt’s Doctor Magnethands. I hope you enjoy this game of hyper-competent nonsense.

This game was a finalist in the 200 Word RPG Challenge 2016.

226867.name: Babble
226867.description:
From the designer's description:

The tower is still standing, but Babel has fallen.

You workers are trapped high in the unfinished tower to Heaven. Can you survive the splintering of tongues?

Use minimal verbal communications and gestures to tell your story and help build the tower.

This game was a finalist in the 200 Word RPG Challenge 2016.

226868.name: Gloomhaven: Solo Scenarios
226868.description:
A set of scenarios specifically designed for strategic solo play - scenarios that would highlight the strengths and weaknesses of each class and force players to really get under the hood and learn to play each class masterfully.

This includes a 24-page scenario book of 17 all-new solo scenarios and a deck of 17 item cards - rewards for completing each of the missions.

226869.name: A Broad Entered My Office
226869.description:
A noir game with fluid roles and an endless possibility of scenes. Take on the role of a PI narrators trying to clear themselves while someone plays a detective determining if they are free to go.

This game was a finalist in the 200 Word RPG Challenge 2016.

226870.name: Conquerings
226870.description:
Conquerings is a team based action RPG featuring the patent pending Moveable Target mechanic.

The Moveable Target mechanic is the novel concept of strategy ring toss. It includes multiple peg boards where the pegs are spaced so that one ring has the potential of getting many pegs. In addition to a ring getting multiple pegs and a kingdom encompassing multiple peg boards there are also targets that can be placed on/around pegs and moved around to activate roles for attacking and defending kingdoms.

The game includes variations of capture the flag, castling, demolition, death match, victory mode, defeat the leader.

This is a game full of genres. Players choose a character with associated kingdom boards. The characters are one of Pirate, Zombie, Knight, Pig Cyborg, Angel or Fairy.(With expansions Yeti, Sorceress, Treant, Reptilian, Cowboy, Siren)
Players decide if they wish to play teams or free for all. Teams can be any of 2v2 or 3v3 or 2v2v2. (With expansions up to 12 players for up to 4 teams of 2 or 3 teams of 3 or 2 teams of 6)

Players have associated roles with their characters of Healer, Tank or Direct Damage(With expansions to include Retribution role, Engineer role and AOE role). Game is made up of variable battle type phases and using the Moveable Target™ mechanic in combination with the choice of variation, players will all attack at once or without order by throwing rings at opponent's kingdom boards. Once the battle round ends, results are scored and play continues until the phase ends. There is a store or decision phase between battle rounds for players to make choices to obtain more rings and/or defensive targets and/or offensive targets and/or morale to steer their game play as they desire.

The Goal is to earn Victory Points. Victory Points raise a players "Level" during the game and at the end of the game the player or team with the most Victory Points wins the game.

226871.name: 2200: Space Exploration
226871.description:
In 2200, mankind finally got into space, thanks to new hyperdrive. Parties were sent where nobody had gone before. This is the story of those who came back.

This game was a submission in the 200 Word RPG Challenge 2016.

226872.name: Shape the Economy
226872.description:
Shape the Economy is a game of strategic buying and selling.
Players own companies and have a store front and an investment center. Invest in a company to become part owner or co-owner. Make money from other players by investing in other companies or selling your product to other companies.

The winner of the game is the player that is first to become co-owner of two other companies. Or the first to make X amount of money depending on players playing.

It is a 2-6 player game with 4 player and 6 player variations.
If playing with 2-3 players the game requires bot companies. If playing with 5 players the game will require one bot company.

226873.name: Starmada Unity Rulebook
226873.description:
The Unity Rulebook represents what we expect will become the definitive version of a game that has gone through several updates over more than two decades. In that time, players around the world have grown to love Starmada for its shallow learning curve, depth of experience, and ease of play, even as they differ over which release represents the One True Vision.

The goal of this edition, designated PROJECT UNITY, was to draw from the best parts of each incarnation of the game, from the Compendium and Starmada X, through the Admiralty Edition and 2012's Nova Rulebook, and unify those concepts in a way that allows experienced starship captains to continue enjoying the game they love while drawing new players into the fold.

Long-time players will be thrilled to learn there is no need to convert existing starship designs to this new edition: comprehensive rules are included which allow players to use both Admiralty and Nova ship display sheets with a minimum of modification.

With the release of the Unity Rulebook, we hope to revitalize the game and introduce the thrills of tabletop battles in deep space to a whole new generation. The Universal Game of Starship Combat is back, and better than ever!

226876.name: Keep it Flyin': Fiasco for Browncoats
226876.description:
From the introduction:

No Power in the Verse can stop you... from screwing things up.

Couldn’t things just go smooth for once? This playset follows the crew of a spaceship as they fly from one job to the next, trying to stay one step ahead of the law, in good graces with their underworld contacts, and out of sight of the space-mad cannibals that lurk behind each nebula. Not to mention stayin’ fed, not gettin’ shot, and keeping a few coins in their pockets. In the black of space, there’s one thing more important than all that. Your ship. You just gotta Keep It Flyin’

226877.name: Little Town, Dark Woods
226877.description:
From the introduction:

Somewhere in the cold American north, far away from the hustle and bustle of the big cities and nestled amongst the woods, sits a small idyllic town. People who pass through the town are often enchanted by its charm, despite it’s being isolated from ‘civilization’ by at least half a day’s drive. And the people are charming too. Everyone knows everyone. It’s a friendly little town.

But under the surface there are secrets. Those they keep from visitors, sure, but frequently those they keep from each other. And it is said that many secrets lurk in the woods beyond the edge of town, where the shadows of trees obscure greater mysteries.

The town has kept itself for a long time, has ensured that those things they keep to themselves remain hidden. But when something terrible occurs in this sleepy little town and people begin digging around to learn the truth, to what lengths will people go to cover their own tracks, to ensure their own horrible truths remain undiscovered?

226878.name: Outpost: Siberia
226878.description:
Welcome to Outpost 1, the first science observatory located in the isolated frozen tundra of Siberia! You and your team have been investigating anomalous activities the region, and recently things have shifted for the worse. The coming storm is said to be the "storm-of-the-century"; it may last a month or more. Strange howls and buzzing fill the long nights, and yesterday a crew-member went AWOL... or worse. The call for evacuation was made, but it came too late. The long winter storm has set in. There's no hope of getting help until it clears. Now your crew's only hope is to use what little resources you have to survive the long winter cold (and whatever's out there in it). Use your rations wisely, and you may see the sun again.

Outpost: Siberia is a fully cooperative, survival game that plays with a single deck of cards. Using an inventive dual-facing system, a single card in Outpost can be anything from life-saving supplies to cataclysmic catastrophes. By enduring relentless weather and defeating untamable beasts, players are rewarded with the much-needed tools and food to continually resupply their resources.

Outpost: Siberia keeps the tension high, as players will need to collect their wits and ration their supplies in order to make through the perpetual perils that lie ahead!

226879.name: Mallevs Maleficarvm, or, Hammer of Witches
226879.description:
From the introduction:

The year is 1488 and the village of Prencott is ill at ease. It may be witches, it may be werewolves, or it may be nothing at all but everyone is out to blame someone, and everyone is out to cover their own arses. The fine balance between rumour and hysteria is about to topple.

226880.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game (Second Edition) – The Fall of Astopor
boardgamefamily: A Song of Ice and Fire
226880.description:
Description from the publisher:

Bloody plots consume the Seven Kingdoms as Daenerys Targaryen liberates Astapor in the manner of Old Valyria — with fire and blood! The Fall of Astapor is the third Chapter Pack in the "Blood and Gold" cycle for A Game of Thrones: The Card Game, continuing the saga of A Song of Ice and Fire into A Storm of Swords. Within this pack, you'll find more cards focusing on the new bestow keyword, powerful new economy, and the subtly growing influence of House Frey. You'll even have the chance to add iconic characters and locations to your deck, including Grey Worm, The Twins, and Theon Greyjoy.

226881.description:
Description from the publisher:

Android: Netrunner – 2016 World Champion Corp Deck – Controlling the Message is a recreation of the deck piloted by Chris Dyer to a first place finish at the 2016 Netrunner World Championship. The deck features extended full-bleed art for every card as well as new visuals for NBN Identity Controlling the Message. This fully-legal deck not only gives veterans a new visual format for classic cards, but allow new players to experience dominating strategies and successful deck-building.
226881.name: Android: Netrunner – 2016 World Champion Corp Deck – Controlling the Message

226882.description:
Description from the publisher:

Android: Netrunner – 2016 World Champion Runner Deck – Whizzard is a recreation of the deck piloted by Chris Dyer to a first place finish at the 2016 Netrunner World Championship. The deck includes extended full-bleed art for every card featured. This fully-legal deck not only gives veterans a new visual format for classic cards, but allows new players to experience dominating strategies.
226882.name: Android: Netrunner – 2016 World Champion Runner Deck – Whizzard

226885.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Rune Golems – Unit Expansion
226885.description:
Description from the publisher:

Crush your enemies with the Runewars Miniatures Game: Rune Golems Unit Expansion. The pack comes with two Rune Golem figures for use with Daqan forces, one a brand new sculpt and the other a copy from the core set. Additionally, inspired commanders will find eight upgrade cards to add to any number of your forces, usable outside of the Daqan faction to further customize your armies.

226886.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Lord Hawthorne – Hero Expansion
226886.description:
Description from the publisher:

Lead your Daqan forces to glorious victory with Lord Hawthorne! Runewars Miniatures Game: Lord Hawthorne – Hero Expansion provides a new hero for use with your Daqan army. The expansion features two different sculpts for Lord Hawthorne, one mounted to join your army's cavalry units, and one on foot to bolster your rank-and-file troops. Additionally, the expansion pack contains six new upgrade cards, four of which will improve any army and two that are exclusive to Lord Hawthorne.

226887.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Spearmen – Unit Expansion
226887.description:
Description from the publisher:

Stand your ground against the enemies of Daqan! Runewars Miniatures Game: Spearmen – Unit Expansion features eight Spearmen plastic figures and two plastic infantry movement trays to expand your Daqan army. Five additional upgrade cards for any army will give you the tools you need to push back any force.

226889.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Carrion Lancers – Unit Expansion
226889.description:
Description from the publisher:

Crush your enemies with the Runewars Miniatures Game: Carrion Lancers – Unit Expansion. The expansion features two Carrion Lancer Plastic Figures, one brand new and terrifying sculpt, and the other identical to the core set version, to expand your legions of the undead. The expansion also features eight new upgrade cards to improve your armies, no matter to which faction you declare allegiance.

226890.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Ankaur Maro – Hero Expansion
226890.description:
Description from the publisher:

Seek ultimate power with the Runewars Miniatures Game: Ankaur Maro – Hero Expansion. The expansion features two different and dynamic sculpts for Ankaur Maro, one cavalry and one infantry, for inclusion in your Waiqar the Undying army. Additionally, you’ll find six new upgrade cards to further bolster your forces, no matter which faction you play.

226893.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Reanimates – Unit Expansion
226893.description:
Description from the publisher:

Expand your ranks of the undead with the Runewars Miniatures Game: Reanimates – Unit Expansion. The expansion features eight Reanimate plastic figures in four different sculpts for use with the forces of Waiqar, as well as five upgrade cards to customize your forces, no matter your faction allegiance. Raise your dead with the Reanimates Expansion Pack and claim all of Terrinoth for Waiqar the Undying!

226894.name: Thunder Lanes USA
226894.description:
Hear The Roar. Feel The Thunder! The Nasty-Car Lane Racing Game!

Two to eight players race a stock car team of three cars in a lane changing and drafting battle of twenty-four cars at the Thunder Valley Raceway.

On a players turn they will play a card to move either their own or opponents car forward the amount of spaces forward whilst also drafting that same amount of rear cars. Only cars in the outer lanes can be moved forward. Players complete their turn by swapping lanes of one of their own cars with an adjacent car of another color.

Wild cards may move any color car and Spin cards can be used to spinout opponents or even your own car!

Points are awarded to the highest placed cars at three stages throughout the race. The player with the team that has the most total points after all Race cards have been played wins!

226904.description:
Offered by GTS Distribution 2017

This "Royal Signet Ring" Royal Writ Mandate card lets you draw 1 king seal from the general supply. Return the card to the bottom of the Royal Writ deck after use.
226904.name: Feudum: Royal Signet Ring Promotional Card

226905.name: Feudum: The Queen's Army – Atticus Promotional Card
226905.description:
From the Summer 2017 Feudum: The Queen’s Army Kickstarter Campaign.

For use in the Feudum: The Queen's Army expansion, This "Atticus" Royal Writ Mandate card lets you cancel any Move action of the Queen involving her royal steed. Return the card to the bottom of the Royal Writ deck after use.

226906.name: A Much Bigger Problem
226906.description:
From the introduction:

For the past sixty-seven years Wheatwinter Farm, a small farm outside the village of Longbranch, has produced an essential survival tool for the town — a unique strain of wheat that can survive the harsh winters of the region. However, for the past few weeks something has been terrorizing the livestock at Wheatwinter and the surrounding farms. Markus Wheatwinter has defended his farm from goblins time and time again, but this time something is different and he has put out a call for aid.

User summary:

For 3rd level characters.

226907.name: Hive of the Overmind
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226907.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 0 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

Younglings on their Rite of Passage are shocked to regain consciousness with no memory of how they came to be in a gigantic insect hive far to the north of their homelands, laboring as drone-slaves of the savage ant-men. In a land where an “insect revolution” has taken place, the PCs must contend with insectoid mega fauna and a maze-like underground installation before facing the ominous Overmind: a building-sized insect queen cybernetically linked to an ancient chaotic AI.

226908.name: A Fallen Star for All
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226908.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 1 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

A meteor strike in the taboo crater country opens up a huge chasm in which lies a largely intact city of the Ancient Ones. The resulting land rush to go claim the newly available cache of ancient artifacts draws interested parties from all over Terra A.D., and at the direction of your tribal elders, that includes you and your Seeker team.

226909.name: Incursion of the Ultradimension
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226909.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 2 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

After a tsunami from the inland Monster Sea nearly washes away your jungle homes, you notice that there’s a new, unknown island laying offshore. Sent out to investigate in dugout canoes, you quickly discover a lost scientific installation of the Ancient Ones, along with the intra-dimensional horrors that they should have left alone but did not. All that’s required to reawaken these impossible 4-dimensional entities after millennia spent in dormancy is the touch of a sentient hand.

226910.name: Star Trek: Ascendancy – Borg Assimilation
226910.description:
The Borg Set To Invade Star Trek: Ascendancy

Red Alert! The Borg are invading Gale Force Nine’s Star Trek: Ascendancy hobby board game later this year. The Borg Assimilation expansion adds an all-new threat to the game. The Borg are an independent menace, attacking players’ ships and assimilating civilized worlds. If the Borg are not dealt with, they could overwhelm the Galaxy. Can the great civilizations put aside their rivalries long enough to face the Borg as a united front? Or will they try to combat the Borg onslaught individually, seizing Borg technology for themselves?

226911.name: Warlords of ATOZ
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226911.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 3 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

When your hothouse jungle home is suddenly flooded with dispossessed refugees, they all tell the same tale. A conquering horde of warlords wielding magic boom sticks are wiping out whole villages and enslaving the inhabitants — all in the name of a surviving Ancient One they worship as a god. The tribal elders send you and your Seeker team out to investigate, and if possible infiltrate, the temple of the great and powerful ATOZ.

226912.name: Blessings of the Vile Brotherhood
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226912.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 5 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

When your tribe’s prize possession — a functioning medibot — finally breaks down, your Seeker team is given a holy quest. Take the dead bot on a long and perilous journey to the the monks of The Holy Medicinal Order in hopes that their shamans can repair it. But the monks are not as the legends portray, and there is definitely something dark and dangerous going on in the holy monastery.

226913.name: The Apocalypse Ark
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226913.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

A level 6 adventure for Mutant Crawl Classics RPG!

When stories of a rogue “smart metal” being the size of a mountain come to your village, no one takes them seriously, at least until the treaded 10-story-tall monstrosity begins cutting a gigantic swath through your hothouse jungle homeland. Invulnerable to even the mightiest mutations, your only hope to stop its menacing march is to find entry to its interior and access its power sources and sinister inhabitants. A rolling dungeon.

226914.name: Judges Screen and Adventure
rpg: Mutant Crawl Classics Role Playing Game
226914.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

Mutant Crawl Classics is here and begging to be played! This 3-panel judge’s screen contains all the essential game tables and reference material. In addition, it includes the 0-level tournament module “Reliquary of the Ancient Ones”!

226915.name: Ashes: The Laws of Lions
226915.description:
Description from the publisher:

She is the commander of the pride, the follower of the path, the righteous judge, and the merciful servant. She emboldens the virtuous and strikes fear in the heart of the transgressor. She is Odette Diamondcrest, and she comes to the hit card game Ashes in The Law of Lions Deluxe Expansion Set.

This set gives players an all-new Ashes deck ready to play out of the box, or with which to begin deck-building. It not only introduces a new Phoenixborn and new cards to the game, but also includes ten new Divine Magic dice and a stylized deck box which neatly organizes a sleeved Ashes deck, ten dice, and all the tokens from the base set.

226916.name: Ashes: The Song of Soaksend
226916.description:
Description from the publisher:

An ancient song binds its silvery strings to every living soul, and Namine Hymntide adds her voice to this unending melody. She plays the strings and subtly alters the song to her will, and comes to Ashes in The Song of Soaksend Deluxe Expansion Set.

This set gives players an all-new Ashes deck ready to play out of the box or with which to
start deck-building. It not only introduces a new Phoenixborn and new cards to the game, it also includes ten new Sympathy Magic dice and a stylized deck box which neatly organizes a sleeved Ashes deck, ten dice, and all the tokens from the base set.

226918.name: Hitman: Sniper Challenge
226918.description:
User Summary

Hitman: Sniper Challenge is a single level, stand-alone DLC for Hitman: Absolution. Sniper Challenge allows players to control Agent 47 as he assassinates Richard Strong Jr, the CEO of weapons manufacturer Stallion Armaments, and his entourage of bodyguards.

Agent 47 takes position with a silenced sniper rifle on a roof overlooking a party that Mr. Strong is attending. The player earns points by eliminating targets. Points allow the player to unlock weapon customizations and upgrades for the sniper rifle to use in later plays.

Players who pre-ordered Absolution were able to unlock weapons in Sniper Challenge and transfer them to Absolution.

226919.description: Runewars Miniatures Game: Dice Pack contains an extra set of the six attack dice — two each of red, white and blue — in the Runewars Miniatures base game.
226919.name: Runewars Miniatures Game: Dice Pack

226920.name: RONE: New Forces
226920.description:
RONE: New Forces is the second expansion of the post-apocalyptic card game RONE: Races of New Era. This expansion pack contains 5 reprinted cards from core set and 99 new cards with two new keywords (Slow Effect and Initiative), which advances the classic gameplay to another level.
Recruit new units to your army, surprise your opponent with new effects,and fight for the victory!

226922.name: Ghost of Dathomir
226922.description:
Description from the publisher:

The dark side is calling you in Ghosts of Dathomir, an adventure supplement for the Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying game. When a mysterious and powerful artifact suddenly surfaces on Toydaria, you embark on a journey into the lawless Outer Rim. Along the way you’ll enter negotiations with a ruthless Hutt kajidic, experience relentless Force visions, and discover some of the darkest secrets of the galaxy.

226923.name: Full Bleed Frame Break
226923.description:
From the introduction:

The city of "Overlook Point" is in trouble! Two if its city zones are "Crime-Infested". Luckily there is an odd assortment of fledgling heroes and vigilantes skulking in the back alleys and scampering over rooftops, trying to set things right! The heroes can retire or move on to a new city once all zones are "crime-free"!

User summary:

This adventure was the first of two created as an examplar, or sample, entry for the contest.

226924.name: Last Stand
226924.description:
A Full Bleed Frame Break Special Encounter

From the introduction:

Jason Jenkins was down on his luck, and signed up for clinical trials for a few bucks. All subjects gained temporarily enhanced physical abilities, but soon began to die. The research was scrapped and covered up, but the experimental drug has been modified and dubbed "Zip". It has been shipped to the street gang known as the "Violet Phantoms" for distribution.

User summary:

This adventure was the first of two created as an examplar, or sample, entry for the contest.

226925.name: Fear of Clowns
226925.description:
User Summary

You wake up in the middle of the night from the doorbell's sound.

226926.name: Crypt of the Lost Hymns
226926.description:
From the introduction:

Three stone archways can barely be seen on the side of the barrow. They are covered by overgrown vines that, if cleared, reveal, etched but eroded by time, a rune on the keystone of each arch. Web covered corridors gently slope down into the darkness.

226927.name: Bubble Guble Super Raum
226927.description:
From the introduction:

Lina (8), Hendrik (6) and Joaquín (4) wrote a dungeon adventure. This is our entry for the One Page Dungeon Contest 2017. I hope it is useful or playable or whatever...

226928.name: Infinite Golf
226928.description:
In this calming golf game you can try 2 different modes.

Source: The Publisher Website.

226929.name: Triple Breakout
226929.description:
Triple Breakout is a breakout game for one or two players combining game mechanics from a traditional breakout game and a pong game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

226930.name: Finger of the Wind
226930.description:
Adventure description from the front page:
A Seven-round D&D 3rd Edition Adventure
The 2000 D&D Open
Parts 4-10 of the 2000 Year of Adventures

The adventure consists of seven 16-35 page "chapters", a 16 page DM booklet, and a 16 page booklet of character sheets, all originally meant to be played as separate rounds in an RPGA tournament at GenCon.

Round One: The Cairns
Round Two: Ogremeet
Round Three: The Drow of Zuggtmoy
Round Four: The Great Gate
Round Five: Storm Winds Blow
Round Six: Tests of the Wind Dukes
Round Seven: Sounding the Chime

226932.name: Kaadoo: The Big Game – African Savannah-Migration Mania Edition
226932.description:
Description from the publisher:

Kaadoo Board Game - African Savannah-Migration Mania Edition.Your safari on the go! Bring the mighty,enchanting Savannah indoors. A Parents' Choice award winning board game
If you are a wildlife safari buff, this board game is for you; if you have never been to a forest, then this game will intrigue you enough to take that first jungle safari.

This board game requires an element of skill & strategy, a bit of luck, but is a whole lot of fun when you play with friends and family.

Anybody aged 6 or above, from a grandparent to grand-child can play the game – it’s clean, pure, and a joy to be exploring the wonderful animals that are part of this planet. So go ahead, bring them around the table, lay out Kaadoo – The Big Board Game and have pure fun!

This edition contains the thrill of playing with lions on a kill, wild beast migration, cheetah with cubs, a resting leopard and the many joys that one experiences on a safari in Eastern Africa.

226933.name: Oiκοςpiel, Book I
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Winner
2017 IGF Awards Seumas McNally Grand Prize Honorable Mention
226933.description:
Oἶκοςpiel translates to house-play. An adaptation of the Oἶκοςpielen Opera's internal history of the years in which they were tasked with designing a debt-forgiving climate-cooling diegetic Grand Geospiel event for the year 2100, a Carnival of operas spanning the globe, home at the north pole Pool, as programmed by Koch Games, a startup of plugged in dogs, whose noses are computed as intuitions and translated into musico-potential forms.

Source: The Game Website.

226934.name: ISLANDS: Non-Places
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Nominee
226934.description:
The familiar becomes magical in this critically acclaimed interactive artscape. Explore ten scenes inspired by the everyday and let your expectations of reality be transformed. Carl Burton's other work has been featured in the New York Times, Serial, Colossal, and Medium.

Source: The Publisher Website.

226935.name: Close
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Nominee
226935.description:
A fox is on a journey through a vast and snowy landscape. Wrapped in a warm coat you may follow him and become a part of his quest. Close is a poetic and atmospheric exploration game about yourself and the other one, about being alone and being together.

Source: The Developer Website.

226936.name: Memoir En Code: Reissue
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Honorable Mention
226936.description:
Memoir En Code: Reissue is an autobiographical game album. Designed to be experienced similarly to a music album, this short experimental game explores different bits of the author's life as a series of interactive tracks.

Source: The Game Website.

226937.name: Witchball
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Honorable Mention
226937.description:
Witchball is a post-reality racing game played by children in the year 2601. Massive environmental change has made much of the world inaccessible, and long-distance travel impossible. Communities are isolated, but communication has advanced to the point where short distances between people barely exist at all.

Source: The Developer Website.

226938.name: Project Perfect Citizen
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards (Nuovo) Best Innovation of the Year Honorable Mention
226938.description:
Project Perfect Citizen is an interactive narrative experience that addresses government surveillance in the modern digital age. In this alternate-day dystopia, the player takes on the role of a no-name employee at the Department of Cyber Police and Security: a division of the government tasked with monitoring all domestic communications within "The Nation". After obtaining a warrant from an automated database extraction system, the player is granted access to their target's Desktop in order to collect incriminating evidence to prove the target's guilt. But when the line between criminality and the everyday struggle is blurred, the player must look to their own conscience to arrest or exonerate the targets he or she is surveilling. In all, Perfect Citizen seeks to take the player on a thought provoking journey through the personal lives of imperfect citizens in order to push the bounds of games as a storytelling medium and create a tense yet intimate gameplay experience that directly engages with the conversation of privacy and security.

Source: The Developer Website.

226939.name: Un Pas Fragile
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Winner
2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Visual Art Honorable Mention
226939.description:
User Summary

Un Pas Fragile suggest you follow the saga of a little frog who wanted to do ballet. To the day she enter the academy until her debut on stage, through the suffering and sacrifices.

226940.name: Sentris
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Audio Honorable Mention
226940.description:
Sentris is a musical performance game. Make your own music as you Drop, Recycle, and Stack "Sound Blocks" into a spinning loop. Freestyle with a huge degree of musical control. Or focus on achieving the goal and let your song emerge organically.

Source: The Developer Website.

226941.name: Elsinore
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence in Design Honorable Mention
226941.description:
On a summer night, the Danish noblewoman Ophelia awakens from a terrible vision: in four days, everyone in Elsinore Castle will be dead. Even worse, she's been thrown into a time loop from which she cannot escape. Forced to relive the same four days over and over again, Ophelia determines to do everything in her power to change the future.

Elsinore is a time-looping adventure game set in the world of Shakespeare's Hamlet. Elsinore combines strong social simulation elements, a dynamic story that reacts immediately to player decisions, and a world full of diverse characters with secrets to uncover. Can Ophelia prevent the tragedy that lies before her?

Source: The Game Website.

226942.name: Lily, Colors of Santa Luz
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Nominee
226942.description:
War is near. A dark militia invaded Santa Luz. Confronted to violent humiliations, the inhabitants are losing their colors. Running away form the darkness threatening to swallow the city, Yvan will do everything to prevent his daughter from seeing the horrors and fight for Lily to keep her colors.

Source: The Developer Website.

226943.name: FAR: Lone Sails
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Nominee
226943.description:
In FAR, the player controls the driver of a large vehicle and explores a massive dried ocean bed in a post-apocalypse world searching for an old civilization. The game is played from a side-scrolling perspective, with the vehicle interior seen as a cross-section. To control the vehicle the player must move around inside it, operating stations and pressing buttons to perform various functions that keep the vehicle moving. They will also be required to solve puzzles in the world to allow the vehicle to pass.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FAR%3A_Lone_Sails FAR: Lone Sails]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

226944.name: Bamboo Heart
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Nominee
226944.description:
Bamboo Heart is a game about a man that got banned from his land, his heart ripped out and replaced with a bamboo one. Scared that you grow cold-blooded you start a never-ending quest in search for your original heart - but you will never succeed. Instead, you turn into the cold-blooded killer you were afraid of becoming.

Source: The Developer Website.

226945.name: DYO
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Honorable Mention
226945.description:
Play as two minotaurs trapped in a maze. Merge your split-screens to find new ways to traverse each level.

Source: The Game Website.

226946.name: Code 7 – Episode 0: Allocation
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Best Student Game Honorable Mention
2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
226946.description:
What would you do if you found yourself trapped on an eerie space station with nothing but a computer? You play the hacker Alex and help your partner Sam uncover the horrible truth of the facility. Code 7 is a text-based hacking adventure that combines a fully-voiced narrative with immersive typing gameplay.
Gather information, navigate and hack your way through the prologue of an epic, five-chapter adventure. It doesn't take long until you have to ask yourself who Alex really is and if your reality is really what it seems to be.

Source: The Game Website.

226947.name: Empathy: Path of Whispers
226947.description:
Empathy takes place "in a surreal world, made from people's emotions and memories, which you can manipulate and explore. Those lost memories are the key to rebuilding the crumbling world back to its former state, discovering its mysterious past and halting the impending apocalypse.

Source: The Game Website.

226948.name: Débrouille-toi!
226948.description:
The players team up in a problem solving contest with MacGivrette. At the start of the game, there are two mission cards on the table. One player is the ignorant who is sent on one of these missions, but doesn't know which one. Everyone else knows. The ignorant has two stacks of item cards, picks one of the two top items and shows it to the first other player, asking whether they will need the item for the mission. The other player may only answer yes or no, but can stress the words in any way they like.
Then the ignorant picks another item and shows it to the next player, and so on. When the ignorant has collected four "yes" cards, he or she has to guess what his/her mission was. If the guess is correct, the next round is played with an additional mission card, up to a maximum of five. If the players can tell a good story about how to use the item, they get an extra point.
All "no" cards go as points to MacGivrette. If an ignorant guesses the wrong mission, MacGivrette also gets the mission cards as a bonus (and the number of mission cards goes down by one). And if any player answers anything else but yes or no, MacGivrette gets that item card as well.
When the group has solved the five mission round, the game ends and they count their cards. They win if they gathered more cards than MacGivrette.

226949.name: Die Reise durch die Schweiz
226949.description: This is a simple roll and move game that starts in Basel. The first player to reach space 60 (Schaffhausen) wins the game. On some spaces, events hinder or benefit the players.

226950.name: Schuss und Tor
226950.description:
Each player has 25 cards. The game consists of 2 halfs (f. e. 2 x 15 minutes). After the first half all cards are returned to the hand of the players. The player who scores the most goals wins the game.

The 5 goalkeeper-cards of each player are shuffled and placed topdown in 2 stacks on the spaces 1 (goal) of the game board.

The 20 fieldplayer-cards of each player are shuffled and 10 cards are placed topdown on the spaces 2-11 on each side of the gamebord. The other 10 cards (reserve) get on the hand of each player.

The starting player (chosen randomly) turns over one of his cards on spaces 7-11 the board. The now revealed card requires a reaction (turning of a card) of an chosen opponent (straight or diagonal ahead).

The two cards are compared and the inferior one is placed beside the game board to build a new stack of reserve cards.
The superior card is moved to the space of the inferior card and may continue to attack another opponent card. If a attacking card is countered by a defending card, both cards are removed from the board and the opponent player gets his opening turn to attack.

Before each opening turn, the player places reserve cards he choses from his hand onto the free spaces on his half of the game board.

The rules are summarized on each side of the game board.

226951.name: Hot Dog King
226951.description:
User Summary

Use legitimate or underhanded tactics to beat your competition - Advertising, management, or working with the mob -- the choice is yours.

226953.name: Clash of Kings
226953.description:
Players aim to crown their king as emperor by reaching the throne (the central square) within the palace(the central 9 squares on a 9x9 board) or by killing all the rival kings.

Simple to learn as most pieces move like in chess but very different to play as four armies quickly clash on a crowded battlefield, sacrificing pieces to clear the way for their king to reach the throne.

With three or four players, multi-player rivalry adds interest and complexity as alliances are made and broken. The two-player variant is more strategic, with each player playing two allied armies, moving pieces from each of their armies on alternate turns.

226954.name: Anvil Angst
226954.description:
Anvil Angst is a game of Disgrace, Despair and Death set in the Live Role Playing world of Empire by Profound Decisions.

Each player is an Egregore (guiding spirit) of one of ten nations within the Empire. Within each nation there is one group of three characters who just do not fit in. Worse than that - they are the antithesis of what their nation should be: they are an Embarrassment to the Empire.

Each Egregore must humiliate and destroy their embarrassing group before the other Egregores can deal with their own embarrassments.

During the game, players will play cards that cause events to happen to characters in their own nation’s group or characters from other nations. These events will affect their mood — some will delight characters, whereas others will disgrace them. When a character is dismayed, it becomes possible for an event to kill them. When all members of one group are killed, then the game ends. The winning player is the one whose embarrassing group accumulated the most despair among their living and dead characters.

226955.name: 1944 La Libération
226955.description:
A card game about the liberation of France in 1944.

Goal: Be the first the exceed the attack value on the chosen combat zone card.

Contains: 5 combat zone cards, 15 attack cards, 9 defence cards, 2 ace cards and 57 unit cards representing allied forces.

Gameplay: You hold 5 cards. On your first turn you start invading by playing a unit card which has a value on it. Take a new card from the drawpile. On your next turn you either play another card to this row or you play an attack card in front of another player. If there is an attack card in front of you either play a unit card or a defence card to it in order to defeat it. When the total value of the played cards exceeds the value of the attack card, all cards are removed. On your next turn you may add unit cards to your invasion-row again.
The first player who exceede the value on the combat zone cards wins.

226956.name: The Big Bang Theory: Trivia Party Game
boardgamefamily: TV Series: The Big Bang Theory
226956.description:
Be the first player to put together your Pixel Pal character (5 pieces) by answering trivia questions correctly.
Questions cover the first 7 seasons of The Big Bang Theory.

226957.name: Escape from Teddy Bear Island
226957.description:
From the Back Cover

You will never make it!

Ok, hotshot: you may have survived the temple of some sort of evil. You may even have helped that poor lady put her minor troubles back into that silly box. Maybe you even told that silly despot to put his clothes back on. That doesn't mean you have what it takes to survive on Teddy Bear Island.

226958.name: Sine Requie Anno XIII: IV Reich Seconda Edizione
226958.description:
From the back of the book:
Il 6 Giugno 1944 il mondo sprofondò nel più oscuro degli inferni. Nel Giorno del Giudizio i Morti iniziarono la caccia contro il genere umano.
Adesso è il 1957, il IV Reich governato dai Quadrunviri domina su gran parte dell’Europa centrale, tentando di schiacciare tutto ciò che gli si oppone.

English translation:
On June 6, 1944, the world sank into the darkest of hells. On Judgment Day the Dead began hunting against mankind.
Now it's 1957, the IV Reich ruled by Quadrunviri dominates much of central Europe, trying to crush everything that stands in its way.

226959.name: Grande eroi in Pigiama
226959.description: Grande eroi in Pigiama /Große Helden in Pyjamas is an adventure game for children. Players represent medieval figures like princess or knight. During the game you try to collect the proper equipment for your hero. The first to complete his hero equipment wins the game. The game is driven by tile-flipping and collecting and requires a lot om memoryzation.

226960.name: Hai Schnappen
226960.description:
Hai schnappen is a dexterity game for children where you try to rob fish out of the mouth of a shark, while trying to getting caught by it.

Beware of a voracious shark!

The shark has already devoured a lot of fish, octopuses and other things. Carefully try to catch its catch from its huge mouth. Once you have done it, you may collect the items in your boat, but beware! If you catch the wrong object, he snaps!

Contents: 1 shark, 12 fish and crustaceans, fishing rod, bait, 4 boats, 1 dice, 1 sticker sheet, instructions


German Text from the publishers website:

Achtung ein gefräßiger Hai!

Der Hai hat schon jede Menge Fische, Kraken und andere Sachen verschlungen. Versuche vorsichtig seinen Fang aus seinem riesigen Maul zu angeln. Hast du es geschafft, darfst du die Gegenstände in deinem Boot sammeln aber Achtung! Erwischt du den falschen Gegenstand, schnappt er zu!

Inhalt: 1 Hai, 12 Fische und Krustentiere, Angel, Köder, 4 Boote, 1 Würfel, 1 Aufkleberbogen, Anleitung

226961.name: Fool The Frog
226961.description:
Don't get caught with the fly One player wears frog-eyed goggles and tries to guess who is holding the fly in this fast paced tossing game. The frog eyes open and close randomly, so other players must be strategic as they throw the fly around in an attempt to conceal who is holding it. Can You Fool the Frog Requires 1AAA battery (not included).

The Fool the Frog Game Feature:

Hilarious Frog-Eyed Goggles

Giggle-inspiring flies to hide from the frog

226962.name: Kamela zick nicht!
226962.description:
Kamela zick nicht! is a dexterity game for childen.
You try to load freight on a camel and try to avoid that the camel buckles up.

Description on publishers website:
„Kamela zick nicht" - ruft mir Ali Baba, mein Kamelreiter, ständig zu. Er hat sich in den Kopf gesetzt die schöne Prinzessin des Landes mit Geschenken zu überhäufen, um sie für sich zu gewinnen. Und wer muss den ganzen Plunder durch die Wüste tragen? Ich natürlich! Nun - ich denke gar nicht daran! Möchtet ihr Ali Baba helfen, mich zu beladen? Nur zu, versucht es doch! Eine falsche Bewegung oder ein Gepäckstück zu viel und ich schmeiße euch alle Teile um die Ohren.

226963.name: Missione Mercurio
226963.description:
User summary:

This is an Italian-language translation of the Mission to Mercury Playset, appearing in Fiasco Companion. It retains the original pagination but is published as a standalone PDF document.

226964.name: Neon City Nights
226964.description:
From the introduction:

Miami, 1986 – a vibrant city of million-dollar mansions, palm-lined boulevards, glittering waves and sun-soaked beaches during a decade defined by material excess, pastel colors and nascent digital technologies.

But when the sun goes down, the city becomes a very different place. Bathed in the glow of neon and sodium vapor, the streets pulse with a potent mix of heat and hustle, narcotics and nightlife, crime and conspicuous consumption. The perfect backdrop for a fiasco...

226965.name: Operators
226965.description:
From the introduction:

The murkier elements that fight in the wars of the world often find themselves tangled up in snafus more complex than any normal combatant would ever encounter. Even outside of combat, soldiers of fortune tend to find themselves involved with the shady, the crappy and the downright sick.

226966.name: The Real Magical Girls of Collingwood
226966.description:
From the introduction:

You didn’t choose the Magical Girl Life, the Magical Girl Life chose you. What’s that sound? Oh, just the music queueing up for your 10-minute long transformation sequence.
